fields_of_interest: Competition, Customs, Single market, Trans-European Networks
eu_initiatives:
Machinery Directive activities including updating the EU Guide to this Directive (2006/42/EC) 
Standardization system including mandate to extend to off-shore equipment 
Proposed Market Surveillance Regulation
membership:
Institute of Explosive Engineers (UK) 
Institute of Quarrying (UK) 
Mountain Rescue England and Wales (Trustee) 
EUROSHNET
goals__remit: Advice on EU Supply legislation and in particular Machinery and related industrial legislation, and on market surveillence in general including the use of ICSMS. Main goal is to help to improve market surveillece in the EU to better protect the public and workers from defective products.
relevant_communication: Speaker at a number of international meetings including Eroshnet 2015; Minutes secretary to Machinery ADCO; promoting in cooperation with ETUI, the use of "feedback" from users of machinery to feed into better design and Standards.
